title: Hundreds more blood cancer patients to receive life-giving drug on NHS
description: Hundreds more people with an aggressive form of blood cancer can now be offered hope of a cure and “a new lease of life” from today thanks to an NHS drug rollout. title: Record numbers of people with type 2 diabetes benefit from NHS ‘soups and shakes’
description: The NHS supported a record number of people with type 2 diabetes to sign up to its ‘soups and shakes’ diet programme last year, helping them to lose weight and potentially put their condition into remission. title: NHS issues flu jab SOS with worst of winter only weeks away
description: The NHS has issued a ‘flu jab SOS’, with England’s top nurse warning people to get protected now, with only weeks to go before the worst of the flu season typically bites. title: NHS England responds to ADHD Taskforce final report
description: An independent taskforce established to tackle challenges in attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) care has today (6 November 2025) published its final report. title: Early flu wave could lead to ‘long and drawn out’ Winter for NHS
description: The flu season has hit the NHS more than a month earlier than usual, with cases three times higher than this time last year.
